TopicTitle: Sar missions not completing when i get into the correct orbit.

Articles.Content:
I have just tried to do a sat mission, a simple one around kerbin. I am in the corect orbit within about 1k. Degree angle is correct , though it says 180. Strange thing is, my probe is able to alter its orbit by itself, with the engine off, SAS off, me not touching anything. 

Even thoguh on occasion it settles, the it still shows its not in the correct orbit.

Anyone else having this problem?

THe probe is just a okto, antenna okto fuel tank and a ant engine, nothing special.

Are you sure you're going around in the correct direction? 180^ sounds like you're supposed to be in a retrograde, not a prograde orbit. Are the little dots of light on the target orbit going around in the same direction as your probe?
ah, that might be it. i look into it thankyou
